getUsers

public java.util.List<User> getUsers(long userTypeId,
                                     boolean includeOmUsers,
                                     boolean includeUserType,
                                     boolean sortedByLogin)
                              throws DaoException
Parameters:
userTypeId - Filtering user type identifier or 0 to get users of all user types
includeOmUsers - true to get all users (even users that only have access to OpenMark), false to get only users with access to GEPEQ
includeUserType - true to include user type information, false otherwise
sortedByLogin - Flag to indicate if we want the results sorted by login
Returns:
List of all users filtered optionally by user type and excluding optionally non GEPEQ users and sorted optionally by login
Throws:
DaoException

getUsersWithoutUserType

public java.util.List<User> getUsersWithoutUserType(boolean includeOmUsers,
                                                    boolean includeUserType,
                                                    boolean sortedByLogin)
Parameters:
includeOmUsers - true to get all users (even users that only have access to OpenMark), false to get only users with access to GEPEQ
includeUserType - true to include user type information, false otherwise
sortedByLogin - Flag to indicate if we want the results sorted by login
Returns:
List of all users without user type
Throws:
DaoException
